UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Protegrin structure-activity relationships: using homology models of synthetic sequences to determine structural characteristics important for activity.
Literature.Author: Ostberg N, Kaznessis Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=2.3µg/ml),Neisseria gonorrhoeae F-62(MIC=1.2µg/ml),Neisseria gonorrhoeae FA-19(MIC=1.9µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=2.7µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=10.2µg/ml)
